sentences.chinese: 吳太伯，太伯弟仲雍，皆周太王之子，而王季歷之兄也。
sentences.literal: Wu Tai Bo, Tai Bo younger brother Zhong Yong, all Zhou Tai Wang sons, and Wang Ji Li brothers also.

sentences.chinese: 季歷賢，而有聖子昌，太王欲立季歷以及昌，於是太佰、仲雍二人乃奔荊蠻，文身斷發，示不可用，以避季歷。
sentences.literal: Ji Li worthy, and had sage son Chang, Tai Wang wanted establish Ji Li and reach Chang, therefore Tai Bo, Zhong Yong two people then fled Jing Man, tattooed bodies cut hair, showed could not use, to avoid Ji Li.

sentences.chinese: 季歷果立，是為王季，而昌為文王。
sentences.literal: Ji Li indeed established, this was Wang Ji, and Chang became Wen Wang.

sentences.chinese: 太伯之奔荊蠻，自號句吳。
sentences.literal: Tai Bo fled Jing Man, self named Gou Wu.

sentences.chinese: 荊蠻義之，從而歸之千餘家，立為吳太伯。
sentences.literal: Jing Man considered righteous, followed and submitted thousand more families, established as Wu Tai Bo.

sentences.chinese: 太伯卒，無子，弟仲雍立，是為吳仲雍。
sentences.literal: Tai Bo died, no son, younger brother Zhong Yong established, this was Wu Zhong Yong.
Zhong Yong died, son Ji Jian established.
Ji Jian died, son Shu Da established.
Shu Da died, son Zhou Zhang established.

sentences.chinese: 是時周武王克殷，求太伯、仲雍之後，得周章。
sentences.literal: This time Zhou Wu Wang conquered Yin, sought Tai Bo, Zhong Yong descendants, got Zhou Zhang.
Zhou Zhang already ruled Wu, therefore sealed him.

sentences.chinese: 乃封周章弟虞仲於周之北故夏虛，是為虞仲，列為諸侯。
sentences.literal: Then sealed Zhou Zhang younger brother Yu Zhong at Zhou north former Xia capital, this was Yu Zhong, listed as feudal lord.

sentences.chinese: 周章卒，子熊遂立，熊遂卒，子柯相立。
sentences.literal: Zhou Zhang died, son Xiong Sui established, Xiong Sui died, son Ke Xiang established.
Ke Xiang died, son Qiang Jiu Yi established.

sentences.chinese: 彊鳩夷卒，子餘橋疑吾立。
sentences.literal: Qiang Jiu Yi died, son Yu Qiao Yi Wu established.
